Author: Jegor Volkov
404: Sorry, we couldn`t find this page
Pay1: Cash on delivery upon receipt from the carrier
Pay3: Payment by bank payment cards Visa, Master Card
Period1: Delivery is carried out by the Nova Poshta delivery service
Period2: Anywhere in the world. Delays are possible before holidays and in bad weather conditions
Buy1: Product selection can be done using the name or the desired product category
Buy2: If you have selected the product you need - click the `Buy` button, then you can continue selecting the product or proceed to placing an order. You can adjust the quantity of the selected products in the basket
Buy3: Please note that the shades on the screen may differ depending on the monitor settings
Buy4: After receiving your order, we will definitely contact you to clarify the time and method of delivery
Buy5: Your contact information is only needed to send the order correctly. This information will not be available to third parties
Shipping1: Orders received after business hours, weekends or holidays will be processed and agreed on the next business day
Shipping2: If you have difficulties placing an order on our website, you can order products by phone or leave a request for a callback: Mon-Sun: from 9.00 a.m. to 9.00 p.m.
GiveBack1: Within 14 days from the day of purchase
